title: Red Bull Arena (Leipzig)
summary: Red Bull Arena (German pronunciation: [ɹɛt ˈbʊl ʔaˌʁeːnaː]; formerly Zentralstadion [tsɛnˈtʁaːlˌʃtaːdi̯ɔn]), is a football facility located in Leipzig, Saxony, Germany. It is the largest football stadium in the former East Germany and has also hosted music concerts as well as football.
